title: End of Activation
text:
Resolve any 'end of Hero activation' abilities or effects (example: burn and other effects).

Model activations continually alternate. Therefore, the player who had the final activation this round cedes the initiative (1st activation) to their opponent next round.

Abilities that can be activated during another action are called ' Interrupt s' and they are labelled as follows <Ability Name>( Interrupt ).
